argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | frlmval.f | |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) |
| 2 |  | frlmbasmap.n | |- N = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | frlmbasmap.b | |- B = ( Base ` F ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_frlmbasmap | |- ( ( I e. W /\ X e. B ) -> X e. ( N ^m I ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` R ) e. _V |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_eqeltri | |- N e. _V |
| 7 |  | #P_elmapg | |- ( ( N e. _V /\ I e. W ) -> ( X e. ( N ^m I ) <-> X : I --> N ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mpan | |- ( I e. W -> ( X e. ( N ^m I ) <-> X : I --> N ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( I e. W /\ X e. B ) -> ( X e. ( N ^m I ) <-> X : I --> N ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( I e. W /\ X e. B ) -> X : I --> N ) |
